articles.title: AI means Google's greenhouse gas emissions up 48% in 5 years - BBC.com
articles.description: The tech giant says it will be difficult to meet its net zero target due to AI using so much energy.
articles.content:
By Imran Rahman-Jones, Technology reporter
Google's greenhouse gas emissions in 2023 were 48% higher than in 2019, according to its latest environmental report.
The tech giant puts it down to the i… [+2936 chars]
